text: Reminder: Group meeting this Thursday at 6 PM. We'll be discussing coping strategies and sharing our progress. Welcome to our new member!
Jane, your insights today were invaluable. Thank you for sharing your knowledge with the group, and a warm welcome to our new member joining us.
